0.text: Innate: Vi gains a  shield equal to  15% of her maximum health for 3 seconds whenever she hits an enemy with an ability.

1.text: Blast Shield's  cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds for every trigger of  Denting Blows.

0.text: Active: Vi  charges while being  slowed by 15% for up to 4 seconds to increase Vault Breaker's  range, speed, and damage over the first 1.25 seconds of the channel. Vault Breaker can be recast at any time within its duration.

1.text: If the charge completes without reactivation, Vault Breaker is canceled and goes on full cooldown.

2.text: Recast: Vi  dashes in the target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemies within her path, increased by 0% − 100% (based on channel time).

3.text: Vi stops upon colliding with an enemy champion,  knocking them back in the direction she is facing, while non-champion enemies hit along her path are instead  pulled towards her.

4.text: Vault Breaker will go on a 3-second  cooldown if the charged channel is canceled.

0.text: Passive: Vi's basic attacks  on-hit and  Vault Breaker apply a stack of Denting Blows to affected enemies for 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent applications. The third stack consumes them all to deal bonus physical damage and  reduce the target's armor by 20%, with the bonus damage capped at 300 against non-champions.

origin: 4 / 5.5 / 7 / 8.5 / 10% (+「 1% per 35 」bonus ad) of target's maximum health

1.text: After triggering Denting Blows, Vi gains  bonus attack speed for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent triggers.

0.text: Passive: Vi periodically stores up to 2 Excessive Force charges.

1.text: Active: Vi's next basic attack within 6 seconds has an  uncancelable windup, gains  50 bonus range and deals modified physical damage, as well as deals the same damage to all enemies in a cone in the direction of the target. Excessive Force can  critically strike for (75% +  35%) AD bonus physical damage.

2.text: Excessive Force  resets Vi's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Vi  reveals the target enemy  champion and  dashes with  displacement immunity towards them, dealing them physical damage and  knocking them up for 1.25 seconds upon arrival.

1.text: Enemies within her path are dealt the same damage,  knocked aside by 350 units over 0.25 seconds, and simultaneously  stunned for 0.75 seconds.

origin: 4 / 5.5 / 7 / 8.5 / 10% (+「 1% per 35 」bonus ad) of target's maximum health
2.concerningText: Passive: Vi's basic attacks  on-hit and  Vault Breaker apply a stack of Denting Blows to affected enemies for 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent applications. The third stack consumes them all to deal bonus physical damage and  reduce the target's armor by 20%, with the bonus damage capped at 300 against non-champions.
After triggering Denting Blows, Vi gains  bonus attack speed for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent triggers.

consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+8% omnivamp against monsters

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sear: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.
Unique – Challenging Path: Using Smite 5 times consumes this item to upgrade your Smite into Challenging Smite, doubling its damage, and grants all item effects permanently after a 2.5-second delay.
Unique – Huntsman: Killing large monsters grants 60 bonus experience. The first large monster killed grants an additional 150 bonus experience, for a total of 210. If you are at least 2 levels below the average level of the game, large monster kills grant 50 bonus experience per level below the average level of all players in the game. If your gold from minions is greater than 40% your gold from monsters, a lane minion will grant 13 less gold and 50% reduced experience. This penalty is removed at 20 minutes.
Unique – Recoup: Regenerate up to 8 − 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the jungle or river, based on missing mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SEAR: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • jungle

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).
passive.originText: UNIQUE: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+40 attack damage
+20 ability haste
+400 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spellblade: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals ( 12% / 9%) of target's maximum health as bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum damage equal to 150% base AD and a maximum damage against monsters equal to 250% base AD. If the target is a champion, heal for ( 7.8% / 3.6%) of the target's maximum health, with a minimum heal equal to ( 97.5% / 60%) base AD (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5% armor penetration, and 5% magic penetration.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPELLBLADE: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals ( 12% /  9%) of target's maximum health as bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum damage equal to 150% base AD and a maximum damage against monsters equal to 250% base AD. If the target is a champion,  heal for ( 7.8% /  3.6%) of the target's maximum health, with a minimum heal equal to ( 97.5% /  60%) base AD (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+50 attack damage
+400 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Bloodlust: After dealing damage to or taking damage from an enemy champion, heal for ( 2% / 1.2%) of maximum health over 6 seconds. This stacks and refreshes per unique champion, up to 5 times, but every stack beyond the first is reduced by 50%, for a maximum of healing for ( 6% / 3.6%) of maximum health over the duration.
Unique – Lifeline: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield that absorbs 100 damage for 4 seconds, increased by ( 8% / 4.8%) maximum health per stack of Bloodlust, up to an increase of ( 40% / 24%) maximum health at 5 Bloodlust stacks (60 second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – BLOODLUST: After dealing damage to or taking damage from an enemy champion,  heal for ( 2% /  1.2%) of maximum health over 6 seconds. This stacks and refreshes per unique champion, up to 5 times, but every stack beyond the first is reduced by 50%, for a maximum of healing for ( 6% /  3.6%) of maximum health over the duration.

Passive

Unique – Ignore Pain: Stores ( 35% / 15%) of all post-mitigation physical damage received, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.
